thread.title: Barnett calls bottom of mining downturn
thread.title_full: Barnett calls bottom of mining downturn

title: Barnett calls bottom of mining downturn
text:
Wed, Sep 2, 2015, 1:21 PM AEST - Australia Markets close in 2 hrs 39 mins Barnett calls bottom of mining downturn AAP – 4 minutes 35 seconds ago Recommend 

The mining industry's downturn will not get worse, West Australian Premier Colin Barnett says. 
"I'm either brave enough or silly enough to suggest that we've hit the bottom," Mr Barnett told the Africa Downunder mining conference. 
Much of the Australian mining industry is at its lowest point in terms of world competitiveness due to weak commodity prices, though the next 12 months would continue to be a risky period for mining companies, he said. @y7finance on Twitter, become a fan on Facebook Growth in line with budget: Hockey AAP 
Treasurer Joe Hockey insists the latest growth figures are in line with his budget forecasts and come at a time … Terms
